Turplesmith,"2019-04-12T02:24:44.203Z","20th Anniversary Polybag Snowspeeder is Fatastic","

I am a huge fan of Polybags and buy them whenever I see them. This set (30384) is a excellent build. The snowspeeder is not difficult to finish and the completed model has great swooshability!!

column13: > Celebrating twenty years of LEGO Star Wars, the Anniversary Sub-Theme includes numerous sets with highly collectible Minifigures to add to your collections. And you get this awesome looking Polybag on top of it. Here are the Pros and Cons of the set and the Final Thoughts afterwards.
